revised_title: The Velocity of Ions Produced in Gases by Röntgen Rays
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the velocity of ions produced in gases by Röntgen rays. They used a method that involved comparing the ionic velocity with the gas stream velocity in an electric field. The results provided a measure of the relative velocities of the gas and ions, which can be used to determine the velocity of ions in a given electric field.
